data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 52,283 believers in the county of Gannan Tibetan to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gannan Tibetan, Gansu, China

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 52,283 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Gannan Tibetan.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Gannan Tibetan, Gansu, China need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 52,283 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Choni people. Make the Choni people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, convict the 52,283 believers in Gannan Tibetan to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Gannan Tibetan, Gansu, China.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Over 90.8 percent of the people of Gannan Tibetan are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
